name: SubmitArPayments
description:
Submits accounts receivable payments for processing.

Use this tool to submit accounts receivable payments to Entrata for processing. It confirms the successful submission of payment data.

parameters.name: client_subdomain
parameters.description: The subdomain of the client organization using the Entrata service.

parameters.name: authentication_type
parameters.description: Set the type of authentication. Accepted value: 'apikey'.

parameters.name: method_name_for_ar_payments
parameters.description: Specifies the method name for accounts receivable payments. Use 'getArPayments' to retrieve AR payments.

parameters.name: response_correlation_id
parameters.description: An arbitrary value used to correlate and track the response.

value_schema.description: an arbitary value to relate with response.

parameters.name: api_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the API to use, options: ['r1'].

parameters.name: ar_payment_ids
parameters.description: Optional. Comma-separated list of accounts receivable payment IDs for processing.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts comma seperated multiple values. Comma separated ar payment ids.

parameters.name: payment_status_type_identifiers
parameters.description: Optional. Comma-separated IDs representing payment status types.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts comma seperated multiple values. Comma separated payment status type ids.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Optional. Accepts a single date value that represents the starting point for the query in YYYY-MM-DD format.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. From date.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Optional field specifying the end date for the request. Accepts a single date value.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. To date

parameters.name: include_allocations
parameters.description: Optional. Set to 1 to include allocations details of payment; 0 otherwise.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. This node should include allocations details of payment

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: an arbitary value to relate with response.

value_schema.description: an arbitary value to relate with response.

parameters.name: method.params.arPaymentIds
parameters.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts comma seperated multiple values. Comma separated ar payment ids.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts comma seperated multiple values. Comma separated ar payment ids.

parameters.name: method.params.paymentStatusTypeIds
parameters.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts comma seperated multiple values. Comma separated payment status type ids.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts comma seperated multiple values. Comma separated payment status type ids.

parameters.name: method.params.fromDate
parameters.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. From date.

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. From date.

parameters.name: method.params.toDate
parameters.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. To date

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. To date

parameters.name: method.params.isIncludeAllocations
parameters.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. This node should include allocations details of payment

value_schema.description: This is an optional field. This field accepts single value. This node should include allocations details of payment
